amendment.description: To permit the National Intelligence Director to modify National Intelligence Program budgets before their approval and submittal to the President.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 3741 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 3741 proposed by Senator Roberts. (consideration: CR S10221-10222; text: CR S10221) To permit the National Intelligence Director to modify National Intelligence Program budgets before their approval and submittal to the President.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3741 proposed by Senator Roberts.
